00170 #define AA_SWAP(a,b) \
00171     {                                                              \
00172         const typeof(a) aa_$_tmpa = (a);                           \
00173         const typeof(b) aa_$_tmpb = (b);                           \
00174         (a) = aa_$_tmpb;                                           \
00175         (b) = aa_$_tmpa;                                           \
00176     }
